com.sap.integration.utils

Class JsonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.integration.utils.JsonUtil

  • public class JsonUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used for converting between JSON objects and class objects.

      • getObjects

        public static final <T> java.util.List<T> getObjects(java.lang.String content,
                               java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                                          throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonParseException,
                                                 org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        Convert JSON object to list of Java objects.
        Parameters:
        content - - string content, which will be converted to list of Java objects
        clazz - - type of class on which will be objects converted
        Returns:
        List - list of converted Java objects
        Throws:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonParseException - possible exception during the processing

      • getObject

        public static final <T> T getObject(java.lang.String content,
              java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                         throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonParseException,
                                org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Convert entered string content to entered class.
        Parameters:
        content - - content, which will be converted
        clazz - - content will be converted to this class
        Returns:
        parsed object with type of entered class
        Throws:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonParseException - possible exception during the processing
